typeMachine.line2: A team consist of vitality , creativity and dream!
typeMachine.line3: We design visual , build connection , we narrate brand story.

about.p1: I'm engineer. I finish my job quick and precisely with Objective C, iOS SDK,node JS,angular JS...etc. Why I become  an engineer. There's one reason only. We have a dream.
about.title: programmer

about.p1: Born in March 1991, I’m just an ordinary college student who wishes to make a difference by changing the world into a better place. I grew up in Chiayi, and graduated from NTUST, which is located in Taipei. At first I studied mechanics, and then transferred to materials, but not until later did I find out that my real interest is in coding. Android SDK, JAVA, JavaScript, CSS3, HTML5… you name it. I believe one day Raymn is going to be extraordinary.
about.title: programmer

about.p1: Youlanda Kuo, born in Taipei, Taiwan, 1991. Graduated from National Taiwan University. I start getting crazy in illustration, graphic design since my college year. I love the temperature of print making, and the different impress of different package design. and I also love to visualize the story behind a brand to make this world feel about it.
about.title: desinger

about.p1: 話說天下大勢．分久必合，合久必分：周末七國分爭，并入於秦。及秦滅之後，楚、漢分爭，又并入於漢。漢朝自高祖斬白蛇而起義，一統天下。後來光武中興，傳至獻帝，遂分為三國。
about.title: manager

about.p1: Rolling , jumping , I close my eyes.  I,incarnation of meaningless,mascot of Raymn, reporting for duty. The world needs me badly just as Raymn Creative agency do . Every day I do my responsibility of keep craping to calm my teammate down. I think I did brilliant job . The world needs me, and I know it.
about.title: mascot
